metadata.Title: CVE-2022-40737 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - low
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in Bento4 through 1.6.0-639. A buffer over-readexists in the function AP4_StdcFileByteStream::WritePartial located inSystem/StdC/Ap4StdCFileByteStream.cpp, called from AP4_ByteStream::Writeand AP4_HdlrAtom::WriteFields.

criterions.comment: kodi-inputstream-adaptive package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
